function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems in resource-limited settings due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear source and intermediate hosts of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disease transmission from person-to-person","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic carriers as potential source of virus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus survival on various surfaces and at low temperatures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modes of virus transmission including direct and indirect contact, respiratory droplets, and fecal-oral route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical features and high-risk groups for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long incubation period of up to 27 days increases the risk of asymptomatic transmission and delayed detection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workplace classification of high-risk groups poses a significant risk of transmission and infection for employees in these settings.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher fatality rates among older and immunocompromised individuals pose a significant risk to these population groups.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 from person to person","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher occurrence and fatalities in certain countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the workplace through shared office tools.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Differing levels of hazard and exposure potential to covid-19 in various workplace environments , hospitals and airports .","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Application of failure mode and effects analysis fmea to different workplaces for risk assessment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of covid-19 preparedness and response plans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to identify and isolate infected persons promptly","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adherence to basic preventive measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate isolation and reporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictions on covid-19 testing by private sector","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of workplace flexibilities and protections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of administrative control measures in the workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate biocontainment features in healthcare facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surge in covid-19 patients requiring space, staff, supplies, and systems to manage capacity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures during activities with suspected or confirmed cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher risk of covid-19 transmission in healthcare workplaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact with health care workers caring for covid-19 patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact with patients diagnosed positive for sars-cov-2 virus infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enhanced infection control measures in various activities with suspected or confirmed cases, samples, material, and waste","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regular covid-19 infection risk assessment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of green space quality","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Health risks originating from social and physical environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little attention to the quality of green spaces may affect the benefits to people","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Degradation and fragmentation of natural habitats in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to pollutants and parasites transmission in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex health and ecological challenges may not be adequately addressed through holistic systems-thinking, leading to inefficient interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Competing or incompatible ecosystem services in urban green spaces may lead to suboptimal provision of services to humans and wildlife.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of interlinkages on the mental health-wildlife-environment interface in urban green spaces may result in inadequate planning and management.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated urban green spaces leading to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management in urban green spaces leading to disease transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper maintenance leading to the breeding of disease-carrying insects and pests in green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incompatibility with the definitions of green space, green space quality, mental health, or wildlife support","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of articles based on language english only","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of study sites not located within urban or peri-urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on zoonotic and vector-borne diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of articles with limited sampling points to green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on wildlife health capacity in urban environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting the environmental dimension and focusing solely on human health","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"}]}
